00023 // Wrapper for Crystall Ball shape plus argus pdf.
00024 //

00040 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00041 BdkPdfCB2A::BdkPdfCB2A() {
00042   // Default Constructor:
00043   addComponents();
00044 }
00045 
00046 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00047 BdkPdfCB2A::BdkPdfCB2A(const char * theName,
00048                                    const char * theDesc,
00049                                    RooRealVar & dependent) {
00050   // Initializing Constructor:
00051   addComponents();
00052   init(theName, theDesc, dependent);
00053 }

00057   // Destructor:

00063     cout << "BdkPdfCB2A::BdkPdfCB2A -- dummy copy constructor"

00068 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00069 void BdkPdfCB2A::init(const char * theName,
00070                             const char * theDesc,
00071                             RooRealVar & dependent) {
00072   // Initializer:
00073 
00074   baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00075   setDependent(dependent);
00076   initParameters();
00077 }
00078 
00079 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00080 void BdkPdfCB2A::setDependent(RooRealVar & dependent) {
00081   // Sets the dependent variable:
00082   _dependent = &dependent;
00083   _cbargus.setDependent(dependent);
00084   _argus.setDependent(dependent);
00085 
00086   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00087 }
00088 
00089 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00090 void BdkPdfCB2A::initParameters() {
00091   // Initializes the contained RRV's and PDF wrappers:
00092 
00093   _frac = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".CBAfrac",
00094                           TString(GetTitle()) + ".CBAFrac",
00095                           0.5, 0, 1);
00096 
00097   _cbargus.init(GetName() + TString(".cbargusPdf"), 
00098               GetTitle() + TString(" Argus Crystall Ball"), 
00099               *_dependent);
00100 
00101   _argus.init(GetName() + TString(".argus"), 
00102               GetTitle() + TString(" Argus"), 
00103               *_dependent);
00104 }
00105 
00106 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00107 void BdkPdfCB2A::createPdf() {
00108 
00109   // Builds the PDF. The PDFs of the contained wrappers are automatically built
00110   RooAddPdf * thePdf = new RooAddPdf(GetName() + TString(".thePdf"), 
00111                           GetTitle() + TString(" thePdf"), 
00112                           *_cbargus.getPdf(), 
00113                           *_argus.getPdf(),
00114                           *_frac);
00115 
00116   setPdf(*thePdf, kTRUE);
00117   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00118 }
00119 
00120 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00121 void BdkPdfCB2A::addComponents() {
00122   // Adds the wrappers to the composite's list:
00123   addComponent(_cbargus);
00124   addComponent(_argus);
00125 }
00126 
00127 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00128 void BdkPdfCB2A::linkParameters(BdkPdfCB2A & pdf2)
00129 {
00130   // Copies RRV pointers:
00131   _cbargus.linkParameters(pdf2.cbargus());
00132   _argus.linkParameters(pdf2.argus());
00133   _frac = pdf2.fracCBA();
00134   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00135 }
00136 
00137 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00138 void BdkPdfCB2A::linkEndPoints() {
00139   _argus.linkParameters(_cbargus.argus().endPoint());
00140   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00141 }
